title: SEE | This reader's retro drawings will take you back in time
text:
Wheels24 reader Frans Esterhuyse was inspired to send in some of his own artwork after reading our article about Garth Cupido’s car drawings earlier in October.

READ | Step back Picasso! This reader's passion for drawing cars is awe-inspiring

Esterhuyse says he was previously the political cartoonist at Beeld newspaper for 16 years, and prior to that, also The Transvaler, Hoofstad and the Oggendblad.

He says his main interest is the arts industry in our country.

Putting pen to paper

These drawings feature some cool retro cars, trucks and bakkies, taking your imagination back to the era when these automobiles filled the streets.

One thing is a constant factor here, the cars are the centrepiece of Frans' drawings, each of which tells its own story.

Here are some of his amazing creations:
